posts.title: Digital Highlights: The Set and Costume Designs of the Music Division
posts.text: A glimpse into the set and costume designs of the Music Division.

posts.title: A Short List of Comics and Graphic Novels for Music Lovers
posts.text: If you like the Beatles, Johnny Cash, The Ramones and other notable bands and musical artists, we have comic recommendations for you!

posts.title: Read Like Lou Reed: Six Books To Start Your Lou Reed Book List
posts.text: Even if you can't make it to the Library for the Performing Arts to see the The Lou Reed Book Collection, you can "read like Lou Reed" with selections that include a William Burroughs novel and a look at the influential Velvet Underground.
